name: Hurt's So Good Trivia Quiz | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
January 22nd, 1940.

	Hurt was born in Chesterfield, Derbyshire, England.

questions.text: What is John Hurt's middle name?
Which famous outsider did John Hurt play in the tv movie 'The Naked Civil Servant'?
questions.explanation:
Quentin Crisp.

	The film is the life and times of Quentin Crisp, an outrageous and flamboyant homosexual, coming of age and growing into old age in conservative London.

questions.text: Which Roman Emperor did John Hurt play in the mini series 'I Claudius'?
questions.explanation:
Caligula.

	Derek Jacobi played Claudius. In this history of the Roman Empire, as viewed by one of its Emperors.

questions.text: John Hurt played Max the Englishman in which 1978 movie?
questions.explanation:
'Midnight Express'.

	'Midnight Express' was directed by Alan Parker, and it also starred Brad Davis and Randy Quaid.

questions.text: In which science fiction classic did John Hurt play Kane?
questions.explanation:
'Alien'.

	'Alien' starred Sigourney Weaver as Ripley, and was directed by Ridley Scott.

questions.text: John Hurt gave a memorable performance as another John in the film 'The Elephant Man'. What John did he play?
questions.explanation:
John Merrick.

	'The Elephant Man', described the life of a horribly disfigured Victorian man (Merrick), and the compassion shown to him by an eminent London doctor. The movie was directed by David Lynch.

questions.text: In 1984 John Hurt played Winston Smith in the movie version of what famous author's classic novel?
questions.explanation:
George Orwell.

	George Orwell's terrifying vision of the future, '1984' came to the screen in that year.

questions.text: What is the name of the zany 'Star Wars' take off in which John Hurt played John Hurt?
questions.explanation:
'Space Balls'.

	1987's 'Space Balls' was directed by Mel Brooks.

questions.text: John Hurt starred as Giles De'Ath in which 1997 movie, directed by Richard Kwietniowski?
questions.explanation:
'Love and Death on Long Island'.

	'Love and Death on Long Island' details the adventures of a widower who falls for the charms of a high school jock(Jason Priestley).
